channel.title: Can i run the browser “Sphere” on whonix?
channel.description: Gd guys, Tell me whether it is possible to start the browser “Sphere” on the whonix, and how to do it? Thanks in advance

item.title: Can i run the browser “Sphere” on whonix?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
If it has source code compatible with Linux there will be some way.

Since I hate snake oil, I have to warn you that no privacy oriented browser tops that of Tor Browser to our knowledge. Sphere may claim to be “private” but I really doubt they have the manpower and researcher community to deliver on that.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i run the browser “Sphere” on whonix?
